show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Dreaming the Preferred State
content: A talk with Peter Warshall, a specialist in biodiversity, conservation-based development, and a founding co-director of... <!--more--> the Dreaming New Mexico project, which has developed community-based methods of creating ways to arrive in what Buckminster Fuller called the “preferred state” regarding renewable sources of energy, local foodsheds, and a Fair-Trade state by 2020 (DreamingNewMexico.org); also PW’s thoughts on the human microbiome as part of biodiversity (more Relational Physiology!); poem by Galway Kinnell
